text:
Ritva Annikki Vepsä (12 February 1941 – 30 July 2016) was a Finnish actress. She was born in Helsinki, Finland.
In 1970 she received a Jussi Award as the Best Leading Actress for her appearances in a Jörn Donner movie "Sixtynine 69" and a Risto Jarva movie "Ruusujen aika".
Vepsä died on 30 July 2016, aged 75, at her home from lung cancer.
